link.title: Welcome to Spencer - Van Etten Central Schools

img.alt: Communications from our Superintendent of Schools
Reminder: Our exterior facilities are closed!

div.div:
Communications from our Superintendent of Schools
4/15/2020
The Spencer-Van Etten Central School District is CLOSED for students effective immediately to May 15th.
Phase 3 Instructional Packet Pick-Up and Phase 2 Drop-Off is May 4th from 8:00am-6:00pm at each school building. Grades 3-8 will be able to pick up their technology.All district COVID communications, along with other valuable resources, can be found using the link below.
Click here for more information.

div.p: Food pick-up behind the high school!
Monday: 8-9:30am Includes breakfast & lunch for Monday and Tuesday
Wednesday: 8-9:30am Includes breakfast & lunch for Wednesday-Friday
Deliveries will begin at 8:45am for those in contact with our Food Service Department.
Wednesday: 8-9:30am Weekend food boxes are available to pick-up as well.

p.b: For further assistance, call 589-7150 or go to our website www.svecsd.org/coronavirus.cfm

div.p: The BOE Budget Hearing/Meet the Candidates Night and the Budget/BOE Vote have been postponed to a later date, after June 1st, due to COVID-19. More details to follow.

div.h1: Reminder: Our exterior facilities are closed!
div.p: The track, all fields, playgrounds, basketball courts and other exterior school property are closed until further notice.
Click below to access our Mental Health Resources webpage!

ul.li: In a safe, respectful and trusting environment

div.noscript: Sorry, you need Javascript on to email me.

div.p:
Spencer-Van Etten Central School District is committed to providing a website that is accessible to the widest possible audience in accordance with the ADA.
We are actively working to increase accessibility and usability of our website for every visitor.
If you are using a screen reader or other auxiliary aid and are having problems using this website, please contact us at 607-589-7100 for assistance.
Information and services available on this website are available at Spencer-Van Etten Central School District.
© copyright 2020, Spencer-Van Etten Central Schools and GST BOCES. All rights reserved.
